articles.description: A new Xbox sale is here with plenty more quick completions to snap up. There might not be quite as many easy Gamerscore titles on offer as last week, but there is still a good number of games on offer.
articles.content:

articles.title: Here's how F1 22 performs in VR - Traxion
articles.description: EA SPORTS F1 22 is the first official Formula 1 driving game to feature virtual reality for those on PC. We donned a HTC VIVE Pro 2 to see if it's any good.
